title: Sales Engineer - German Speaking
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every designer, engineer, researcher, and artist in the world. Our solutions are used by Google, Tesla, Gillette, and New Balance, just to name a few.
Our Direct Sales team in EMEA is looking for an experienced sales engineer who will be a problem solver and a proactive technical expert to our direct sales representatives and direct customers. As a key technical advisor and product advocate, you will identify and provide reliable solutions for all technical challenges to assure complete customer satisfaction through all stages of the sales process. If you’re excited to take an active role at the forefront of the next industrial revolution and lead our fast-growing, global company into new territory, join us as a Sales Engineer in our Budapest office.
Your challenge:
Develop a deep understanding of our product capabilities, services and technologies
Effectively communicate and guide direct customers
Serve as the technical expert and consultant to our direct account base and customers during pre- and post-sales which will involve product demonstrations with compelling sales presentations
Provide sample part printing service to direct customers
Support lead generation activities, e.g. hosting webinars, creating written content and application guides 
Provide resources to existing users to improve customer experience and develop upsell opportunities
Quickly adapt, work flexibly on inter-team projects within the direct sales team
You:
Speak English and German
Strive for customer satisfaction and drive for results
Have relevant industry experience and have technical background (mechanical engineering, CAD, CAM or other relevant field)
Passionate about 3D printing, willing to get your hands dirty
Effective communicator that thrives telling stories and presenting to small- and large- audiences
Analytical problem-solver with proven ability to breakdown problems, develop solutions and drive results
Familiar with customer-facing work, including developing and delivering training
Bonus Skills:
Experience in serving our specific customer demographics - manufacturers, product designers, educators or engineers
Experience with 3D printing
We Offer:
Monthly Wolt credits (70000 HUF/month) for food delivery to the office
Private health insurance with Medicover (Blue package + hospital coverage)
A monthly or quarterly public transportation pass for Budapest
Free beverages and snacks at the office
All You Can Move sports pass with 7000 HUF monthly allowance
Free 3D prints
An inclusive, dog-friendly office with diverse and inspiring colleagues
Development opportunities both in-house and off-site
We build amazing things. Come join us!
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in our company.  We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.  
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply. Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing.
